abstract: A Seattle firm has created a new site, ObamaCTO.org, for people to funnel tech policy ideas to the Obama administration.
snippet: A Seattle firm has created a new site, ObamaCTO.org, for people to funnel tech policy ideas to the Obama administration.
lead_paragraph: Tech geeks are tickled that come January, one of their kind will be in the White House. With the election of Barack Obama, a text-messaging Facebook user who has promised to hire the nation’s first chief technology officer, Silicon Valley has a newfound interest in the inner workings of Washington.
